titles.title: Waiving a requirement of clause 6(a) of rule XIII with respect to consideration of certain resolutions reported from the Committee on Rules.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 75.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-209, by Mr. Reynolds.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 242.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 303 - 107 (Roll no. 345).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/20/2001--Introduced. Waives the requirement under rule XIII of the House of Representatives of a two-thirds vote to consider a Committee on Rules report on the same day it is presented to the House, with respect to any resolution reported by such Committee on September 21, 2001, providing for consideration or disposition of a bill to preserve the continued viability of the U.S. air transportation system.
